com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawable

    • Uses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl

      Subclasses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DummyDrawable<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
      The most basic implementation of Drawable that doesn't render anything to the screen.
      class  ImageIcon<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>,Img extends GraphicalPrimitive<Rend,Pos,Scalar>>
      A basic Drawable implementation that holds a GraphicalPrimitive and renders it on the screen as the representation of itself.
      static class  ImageIcon.Plain<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
      Variant parametrized directly with GraphicalPrimitive instead of any its subtype.

    • Uses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

      Subclasses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
      Basic base class for all Layouts.
      class  BasicLinearLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
      Basic layout for arranging Elements in line.
      class  PrimitivePositionalLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
      The most basic and primitive implementation of BasicAbstractDrawable, that has the child positions set directly and doesn't apply any logic for restraining its children to not exceed the borders set to the layout.

    • Uses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.formsgdx.examples

      Subclasses of BasicAbstractDrawable in com.markussecundus.formsgdx.examples 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Slider<Telo extends GraphicalPrimitive<? super BasicRenderer,Vect2f,java.lang.Float>,Cudlik extends GraphicalPrimitive<? super BasicRenderer,Vect2f,java.lang.Float>>
      Demonstrační implementace jednoduchého slideru provedená za pomoci služeb poskytnutých Formulářovými knihovnami.
      static class  Slider.Basic
      Konkrétnější implementace, kde grafická stránka je tvořena zaoblenými obdélníky s obrubou a když je slider zakliknutý, změní jeho čudlík barvu.
